summary: *The Chronicles of Narnia* is a popular book series by C.S. Lewis, consisting of seven fantasy novels. The story takes place in Narnia, a magical land with talking animals and mythical creatures. It follows the adventures of kids from our world who get transported to Narnia. They are often helped by a lion named Aslan to fight against evil forces. The books tell the whole history of Narnia, from its beginning to its end. With over 120 million copies sold, it is considered a classic in children's literature.
title: The Chronicles of Narnia
